title: Create an Upsell Offer in the Cart
description: When a customer adds a specific product to their cart, the system should offer them a related, more premium product as an upsell.

tasks.description: Detect when a specific item (e.g., 'Standard Headphones') is added to the cart.
tasks.expected_outcome: System correctly identifies the trigger product.

tasks.description: Based on a predefined rule, display a promotion for a related, higher-margin item (e.g., 'Noise-Cancelling Headphones').
tasks.expected_outcome: System shows a relevant upsell offer to the customer in the cart view.
